TquaAggregator.mainSelect: select v.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR, --0 v.cpod, --1 a.operando, --2 TO_CHAR(v.cdsti, 'YYYYMMDD'),--3 TO_CHAR(v.cdces, 'YYYYMMDD'),--4 valori, --5 DECODE( B.OPERANDO,'EQT_EAC' , nvl(d.consumo_annuo_f0,0) , nvl(VALORI,0) ), --6 b.id_operando --7 from DBI_USER.ifc_sap_anagrcontrele v, z_prodotto_operando a, z_anagrafica_operandi b ,DBI_USER.ifc_sap_punti_fornitura d, instln_data e where v.ctar1 = a.ctar1 and a.acquisizione= v.cfreq and d.dbi_punto_key= v.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR and v.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR IN(select cncon from z_test_contratti where note = 'lotto 40') and a.operando = b.operando and b.tipo = 'TQUANT' and v.cpod=e.legacy and TO_CHAR(v.cdsti, 'YYYYMMDD')>=e.ab and v.d_valido_dal=d.valid_from and v.d_valido_al=d.valid_until -- AND Get_Bis2(b.Operando,a.Ctar1,v.cdsti,v.cdces,Data_Validita_Al) > '20080401' group by v.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR, --0 v.cpod, --1 a.operando, --2 TO_CHAR(v.cdsti, 'YYYYMMDD'),--3 TO_CHAR(v.cdces, 'YYYYMMDD'),--4 valori, --5 DECODE( B.OPERANDO,'EQT_EAC' , nvl(d.consumo_annuo_f0,0) , nvl(VALORI,0) ), --6 b.id_operando

FactTquaExtractor.mainSelect: SELECT FACTS_KEY.LEGACY, --0 FACTS_KEY.TIPO,--1 FACTS_KEY.ANLAGE, --2 FACTS_KEY.BIS, --3 facts_f_tqua.legacy, --4 facts_f_tqua.tipo, --5 facts_f_tqua.operand, --6 facts_f_tqua.saison, --7 facts_f_tqua.timbasis, --8 facts_f_tqua.timtyp, --9 facts_f_tqua.prog, --10 facts_v_tqua.legacy, --11 facts_v_tqua.tipo, --12 facts_v_tqua.ab, --13 facts_v_tqua.bis, --14 facts_v_tqua.tarifart, --15 facts_v_tqua.prog --16 from facts_key,facts_f_tqua,facts_v_tqua where facts_key.legacy = facts_f_tqua.legacy and facts_v_tqua.legacy=facts_key.legacy and facts_f_tqua.legacy=facts_v_tqua.legacy and facts_f_tqua.prog=facts_v_tqua.prog order by facts_f_tqua.prog
